title: Merciless Memories
description: Mercy Minor is broken...She is shattered by a guy that date-raped her when she was at a frat party at semester's end. She hasn't told anyone what happened, except her best friend Gemma of course. Now, almost 3 months later, the new semester has begun. She's finally venturing out of hiding to start her new classes, but she doesn't think she'll ever trust another guy again.Then she meets Camden Michaels, MMA self-defense trainer, and all bets are off. He's smart, sexy, kind. Most of all, he's kind.But does kindness equate to trust?Not only that, but there's something about him... something altogether different, and it's not just the kindness thing. Mercy can't quite put her finger on it. Will she allow Camden to get close enough to learn his secrets?Does she even want to know his secrets? This is episode 1 in a college based drama dealing with dark themes, with some paranormal elements. 6 episodes in all. See author's site for release dates for next 5 episodes.
author: Eden Rowan
